name: Shear the Sheep (Ariel Martinez)
description:
Shear the Sheep is a strategy and time management casual game, like Diner Dash or Farm Frenzy.

The game consists of shearing the sheep to get their wool. But beware! Among the sheep there may be a hidden wolf in disguise, which upon being discovered will begin to eat your sheep. To mitigate it, you can use the shotgun and kill it.
But, do you want to spend your precious time looking for the impostor?

Controls

Click - to shear sheep, pick sheep or wool. Also, to kill wolves once you discovered them.
Hold click - to drag wool or sheared sheep. You have to drag the wool to the wool truck and the sheared sheep to the sheep truck.
1, 2 and 3 keys - to change between tools

Try to shear as many sheep as possible before running out of time or having 3 sheep being devoured by wolves. There are fake trucks that will take your wool and give you nothing in return, beware of those! You have to pay attention either visually or via sound to know which truck is which. This will also help when trying to find the wolf!

 Try to score more and more every time you play!

Made with my friends:

@faro_max

#Jerometa

Shear the Sheep was a student project for our third year project in the Design and Production of Video Games career.

You have to install Unity to play Shear the Sheep. After that, you only need to execute the .exe to start playing!

We hope you enjoy the game!
